reference: Brian Abel-Smith, Major Patterns of Financing and Organization of Medical Care in Countries Other Than the United States, Social Policy for Health Care, New York, New York Academy of Medicine, 1969.
K. J. Arrow, Government Decision Making and the Preciousness of Life, in Laurence R. Tancredi (ed.), Ethics of Health Care, Washington, D.C., National Academy of Sciences, 1974.
A. Breton, The Economic Theory of Representative Government, London, Macmillan, 1974.
Martin S. Feldstein, The Welfare Loss of Excess Health Insurance, Journal of Political Economy, Vol. 81, No. 2, Part 1, March/April 1973.
Mark G. Field, Soviet Socialized Medicine, New York, The Free Press, 1967.
John and Sylvia Jewkes, Value for Money in Medicine, Oxford, Basil Blackwell, 1963.
Maurice Le Clair, The Canadian Health Care System, in Spyros Andreopoulos (ed.), National Health Insurance: Can We Learn from Canada?, New York, John Wiley and Sons, 1975.
C. M. Lindsey, Medical Care and the Economics of Sharing, Economica, N.S., No. 144, 1969.
Arthur Okun, Equality and Efficiency, the Big Tradeoff, Washington, D.C., The Brookings Institution, 1975.
Mark V. Pauly, Medical Care at Public Expense, A Study in Applied Welfare Economics, New York, Praeger, 1971.
